biotools.summary: Automated analysis of mosaic imaginal discs in Drosophila | Fly-QMA: Quantitative Mosaic Analysis in Drosophila | Fly-QMA is part of the NU FlyEye platform for studying gene expression in the developing Drosophila eye. The package enables Quantitative Mosaic Analysis (QMA) - that is, it helps users compare expression levels between distinct clonal subpopulations within the eye epithelium
